comments.body: Do you perhaps have issues you could attach to these as to why they are disabled for rocm?

We have not yet root-cause analysis of why these tests are failing on the rocm side. They showed up as regressions, when we did a (upstream repo ---> rocm fork) sync last week.  They were tagged as no_rocm at that point.

There are two processes going on concurrently on the ROCm side. 
* One is to get the contents of our fork in sync with the upstream repo. This PR is a part of that process
* At the same time, we are also looking into the existing test failures on the ROCm platform, and fixing them. These failures will be looked at as part of that process. I will post more information once I have it.
